title: You guys are soft. This isn't toxic
body:
Game 1
In-Game
Black Bald Eagle: you gonna sit here all game
Black Bald Eagle: you actually stole that
Black Bald Eagle: dope
Black Bald Eagle: good shit
Black Bald Eagle: hes tilted
Black Bald Eagle: so he wont listen
Black Bald Eagle: so u can stop inting
Black Bald Eagle: lul
Black Bald Eagle: olaf no flash
Black Bald Eagle: no fight yet
Black Bald Eagle: 10 sec
Black Bald Eagle: kill before taric ult drop
Black Bald Eagle: imagine
Black Bald Eagle: just not getting caught
Black Bald Eagle: for 5 seconds
Black Bald Eagle: crazy right
Black Bald Eagle: ff plz
Black Bald Eagle: can you guys stop trolling
Black Bald Eagle: for 10 sec
Black Bald Eagle: literally their only threats are olaf and taric ult
Black Bald Eagle: just group go in
Black Bald Eagle: 1 shot xer and sona
Black Bald Eagle: before ult drops
Black Bald Eagle: ggez
Black Bald Eagle: or get caught
Black Bald Eagle: ^^^
Black Bald Eagle: but you keep walking into him
Black Bald Eagle: :D
Black Bald Eagle: :DDDDD
Black Bald Eagle: :DDDDDDDDDD
Black Bald Eagle: imagine
Black Bald Eagle: just not right clicking to him
Black Bald Eagle: :DDDD
Black Bald Eagle: i did
Black Bald Eagle: and then you inted
Black Bald Eagle: LD
Black Bald Eagle: XDDDD
Black Bald Eagle: ff
Black Bald Eagle: ok urdumb
Black Bald Eagle: nvm
Black Bald Eagle: end mid plz
Black Bald Eagle: Gg
Black Bald Eagle: end
Black Bald Eagle: this lux
Black Bald Eagle: is worse than urgot
Black Bald Eagle: idk why she keeps typing
Black Bald Eagle: nah ur just dum lmao
Black Bald Eagle: you think him not ganking is the problem
Black Bald Eagle: when uts you constatly wlaking into them
Black Bald Eagle: but ur dumb
Black Bald Eagle: so obv u gonna think ur right lul
Black Bald Eagle: nah
Black Bald Eagle: let them end
Black Bald Eagle: never said that
Black Bald Eagle: to lose yeah
Black Bald Eagle: cause your sup is inting
Black Bald Eagle: cant feel when shes dead
Black Bald Eagle: Gg
Post-Game
Black Bald Eagle: easily the most useless sup ive seen
Black Bald Eagle: straight running into olaf every fight
Black Bald Eagle: ll


Is this a lot of typing, yeah....but the only offensive thing is calling someone dumb. We need the MW2 days back.

replies.body: You were harassing your team repeatedly.

The system doesn't punish based on severity alone. It punishes based on consistency x severity, meaning you can be punished for 1 game of extreme toxicity or many many games of mild toxicity. 

Negative attitude in the form of giving up. Accusing others of trolling/inting. General harassment towards others. Combined together while not extreme, will still be considered as mildly toxic. 

When you do this over many games, you will get punished.

Alot of times your team are trolling/griefing/inting, you just cant tell them that, what i do is just report them

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}

riot games with their automatic bans/punishments are a fkin complete joke, recently got 2 weeks ban without chat restriction or anything just for calling someone "f a g" the whole company is a dogshit joke
I mean you really try blaming them for punishing homophobic slurs?

Accusing people of inting/trolling/etc., announcing intent to forfeit, calling people "dumb," and harassing people about their performance are considered toxic behaviors. You engaged in such behavior the entire game. Therefore, your behavior was toxic. If you only got a chat restriction or temporary suspension, be aware that continuing this behavior will eventually get you a permaban, whether you agree with it or not, and whether you understand or not.
this thread only further proves my point on how soft everyone is lmaooooooo

Sure. Call it whatever you want.

We're just here to let you know of the rules and how the system works. Just don't be surprised about the consequences when you don't follow Riot's rules in Riot's game.
this thread only proves how soft _you_ are

No, you're just being ignorant of the policy you agreed to. 
That is toxic. Adjust your attitude.

Yeah, insulting players is against the rules. Idk in what world calling people dumb isnt toxic. I mean, whether its soft to take offense to it or not is something else, but its objectively toxic. Also, idk why you would say it if you werent trying to make them feel bad. Like what was your goal in letting them know theyre dumb? Its to offend them, no? Because its natural to take offense to that, no? If people just told you that youre dumb all day, you would have a natural reaction to that, wouldnt you? And i dont mean your friends. I mean strangers just calling you dumb.
I mean you'd call a bird a bird right? so if they're dumb, then calling them dumb wouldn't be wrong

> [{quoted}](name=Black Bald Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1AwqYJRQ,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2019-07-18T00:01:05.688+0000)
>
> I mean you'd call a bird a bird right? so if they're dumb, then calling them dumb wouldn't be wrong

Lol yes it would. Theyre strangers. Do you walk up to fat people and call them fatass? Is that not an insult in your fantasy world?
i mean you wont be punished if you call a human a human which is the same as calling a bird a bird.

> [{quoted}](name=Black Bald Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1AwqYJRQ,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2019-07-18T00:01:05.688+0000)
>
> I mean you'd call a bird a bird right? so if they're dumb, then calling them dumb wouldn't be wrong

Some things, you just don't say at all. That's one of those. There is nothing wrong with calling things by their name, but in some cases it's better to just keep your mouth shut.

it's an automated system

you got punished for toxicity consistency not for this particular game regardless that that game triggered the ban
Give it another 5 years and you'll look back and realize you were a dick.
Never assume that age grants introspective ability. I know people of all ages who are incapable of analyzing their own actions and behaving better.

> [{quoted}](name=GatekeeperTDS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1AwqYJRQ,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2019-07-18T13:28:45.838+0000)
>
> Never assume that age grants introspective ability. I know people of all ages who are incapable of analyzing their own actions and behaving better.

Yea, but I'm going off experience here. I was a dick until like age 26 when I realized I was being an ass and should care more about other people

Agreed. There are very few things I'd want to repeat about my twenties. Empathy has never come easily for me, explainable by my upbringing. I absolutely do not go out of my way to harm people, but it did take a while to learn "Shut up, me." If you know what I mean. :)

> Is this a lot of typing, yeah....but the only offensive thing is calling someone dumb. We need the MW2 days back.

You don't have to be offensive to be a jerk.

Calling people useless, calling people dumb more then once, giving up in chat saying end pls, ff pls is griefing, calling out every little problem you see inting not ganking etc, calling people trolls, only positive thing i see is when you congradulated someone for stealing dragon or buff could be passive aggressive if they ks something from someone.

Tbh to much typing to focused on others and not your self and legit calling people dumb saying they are inting calling them trolls and asking enemy team to end and asking your team to ff is the definition of toxic, rude, and griefing. No one wants to play with people like that. The fact is people have bad games so do you its why you was placed with them cause ur mmr is similar, you are no better then anyone else in the game and you have no right to be that rude and toxic towards them. If you see something you dont like be constructive dont say oh your inting or running it down, also stay out of all chat and do not tell enemy team to end or asking for ff from your own team, at that point you clearly have a grudge vs someone on ur team and are willing to lose the game and make everyone in ur team lose because your feelings are hurt. Just stop typing focus on your game and win.

soft you say ? 
well.... I got penalty for less than that while I believe i said more than what you said in other games ,and you say soft ? 
compare to what i said you deserve more
Well, if you use the chat for ANYTHING other than saying nice things to your teammates, you risk gettin' banned.
